name: Penguin Primary
description:
A small educational quiz type game where you play as a penguin and answer questions by sliding into ice blocks.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • W, A, S, D keys to Move Up, Left, Down and Right respectively
  • Hold the Space key to Slide
  • Aim the Slide using the Mouse

Slide into the ice block that you think is the right answer!

Also:

  • Escape to Exit game
  • R to Restart game
  • F to toggle Fullscreen

Credits:

Font is 'Indie Flower' by Kimberly Geswein, from: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Indie+Flower
